title: Help with Hexchest
body:
Hello, 

In my profile it says that I have 4 chest available, so I'm maxed out essentially.

However, when I go under Loot and Crafting Inventory it shows Open (O). I have a key so I'm not sure why I can't open a chest? Am I missing something?

Thanks,
CoogBear

replies.body: Looking into this for you, I don't currently see any chests on your account.  The chest icons on your profile show how many champion mastery chests you can obtain for that week.  Once obtained, the icon will fade out and one slot will refresh in roughly a week.  More information on this is also available in our [hextech crafting](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide) guide.  Let me know if you have any questions!

Thanks for looking into this. After reading the hex tech crafting guide, I am certain that there are 4 champion mastery chest available when I look into the Profile Section. Some anecdotal reasons why I believe this: I remember seeing a message saying that the "next chest will come in x days" or something along those lines, but it's no longer there; I haven't opened a chest since I started the game last month; and I've definitely been in games where my partners or I have received "S" ratings.

I guess my question is, are "Champion Mastery Chest" different from "Hextech Chest?"

I think I get your problem, or I MIGHT. the chests in your PROFILE, when golden, are chests you are ABLE to earn by getting S-ranks on champs or having a queue-mate earn an s-rank on a champ, not chests you actually OWN. Chests you actually OWN cannot be maxed out (unless we talk about the yearly max, of course)

Yes, you identified the source of my confusion, thank you. So I guess my question has evolved: I have 4 champion mastery chest available, so I'm maxed out (if i'm thinking about it correctly). What can I do with these??? Do I open them?

Are you sure you have a key and it's not just a key fragment that is showing in the inventory?

if you can see it and it has a little (1) at the bottom right it's a fragment, you need 3 to craft into a full key.
Hello - thanks for the response. Yes I have a key. It states it at the bottom of the screen between the Hextech chest and Essence.
